settings.giftcardMessage:
CLAIMING YOUR GIFT CERTIFICATE IS EASY!
Simply type the gift certificate code below and click “Apply” to attach the gift certificate to your account. You may use your total credit balance for any purchase you make today or in future.
settings.giftcardbalMessage: You currently have a gift certificate balance of {0}. This balance is available for you to apply to any future purchases here on www.jellybelly.com.
settings.shippedMessage: Hurray! Your order shipped and we sent an email with tracking information. We hope you enjoy your treats and please let us know if anything is amiss!
settings.processingMessage: Good news! We're in the middle of packing and shipping your order. Keep an eye out for an email with shipping information.
settings.acceptedMessage: Congratulations! Your order has been received and will be processed as soon as possible.
settings.heatSensitiveStatesPDP: Cold packs will be included, and shipping rates will be affected for, shipments of this product to the following states:
settings.heatSensitiveStatesCart: Cold packs will be included, and shipping rates will be affected for, shipments of this product to the following states:
settings.heatSensitiveStatesCheckout: Cold packs will be included, and shipping rates will be affected for, shipments of this product to the following states:
settings.emailMissing: Error: Please enter a valid email address
settings.passwordMissing: Error: Please provide a valid Password, which must have a minimum of 6 characters with at least 1 number and 1 alphabetic character
settings.passwordsDoNotMatch: Error: Please provide a valid Password, which must have a minimum of 6 characters with at least 1 number and 1 alphabetic character, a second time.
settings.passwordsDoNotMatchforaccount: Error: Please make sure that the matching Passwords you have entered are valid (at least 6 characters, with at least 1 number and 1 alphabetic character) in each field.
settings.phoneMissing: Error: Please add your Phone Number.
settings.streetMissing: Error: Please add your Street Address.
settings.cityMissing: Error: Please add your City or Town.
settings.postalCodeMissing: Error: Please add your Postal Code.
settings.countryMissing: Error: Please make a country selection
settings.firstNameMissing: Error: Please add your First Name.
settings.lastNameMissing: Error: Please add your Last Name .
settings.myAccountGiftCertificateItemNotFound: Sorry, but '{0}' does not appear to qualify as a valid coupon code. Please be sure that you're using the correct code (copy-and-paste may help), that it hasn't expired and that you have met any required threshold.
settings.resetPasswordMessage: Please make sure your Email Address is correct and that you have an account. Make sure you have included the '@' and the '.' in the address
settings.resetPasswordEntered: Please make sure you have entered your new Password, which must have a minimum of 6 characters with at least 1 number and 1 alphabetic character, twice.
settings.differentFromPreviousPasswords: To keep things safe, your new Password cannot be one of your 4 previous Passwords. Please make sure the new Password has a minimum of 6 characters with at least 1 number and 1 alphabetic character.
settings.resetEmailSent: You should receive an email with instructions to reset your password shortly.
settings.validEmail: Please enter a valid Email Address and Password combination. Make sure you include the '@' and the '.' in the Email Address and that your Password has a minimum of 6 characters with at least 1 number and 1 alphabetic character.
settings.validPassword: Error: Sorry, but your password doesn't meet the requirement. Use at least 6 characters, with a minimum of 1 letter and 1 number.
settings.passwordNotMatch: Sorry, but your Password and Confirm Password entries don't match. Make sure your new Password has a minimum of 6 characters with at least 1 number and 1 alphabetic character.
settings.city: Error: Please add your City or Town .
settings.addressType: Error: Please select the appropriate Address Type so that we know where to deliver the package.
settings.chooseShippingMethod: Error: Please select a shipping method.
settings.cardFormat: Sorry, but that Card Number appears to be invalid, as it is in an unrecognized format.
settings.cardType: Error: Please select your Card Type
settings.cardNumber: Error: Please enter your Card Number
settings.nameOnCard: Error: Please enter the Name shown on your card.
settings.expires: Error: Please enter an Expiration Date in the future.
settings.validEmialSignUp: Error: Please be sure to provide your Email Address. Make sure you have included the '@' and the '.' in the address.
settings.validPasswordSecond: Error: Please provide a valid Password, which must have a minimum of 6 characters with at least 1 number and 1 alphabetic character, a second time.
settings.missingcredentials: Sorry, but you need to enter an Email Address and Password.
settings.alreadyassociated: Error: Sorry, but that Email Address is already associated with an account on our site
settings.lockedaccount: Error: Sorry, but you've exceeded the allowable number of attempts. Contact us and we'll help.

pageTypes.title: Shop our product brand listing Static page

defaultConfig.head: Jelly Belly Candy Company
defaultConfig.content: Did you know that Jelly Belly Candy Company makes more than just world famous jelly beans? We are proud to offer our enormous line-up of gourmet treats, from jelly beans to chocolate to gummi candy, here on Jellybelly.com. Explore our candy and see what makes Jelly Belly better than the average candy company!
